scenarios.label: Leaky integrate-and-fire cycle
scenarios.description: Single accumulator with constant drive and linear leakage, representing a canonical saw-tooth.

scenarios.label: Three-step accumulation ladder
scenarios.description: Accumulator climbs through three thresholds with partial releases that create a staircase trace before full reset.

scenarios.label: Buffered queue with relief valve
scenarios.description: Buffer fills at varying rate with stochastic inflow; when capacity is reached a relief valve dumps most contents and leaves a residual backlog.
